name: instabits
description: Modern Chrome Extension for Instagram with enhanced video controls and automation features

scripts.dev: npm run build:main && vite build --config vite.config.content.ts --watch --mode development
scripts.build: tsc --noEmit && npm run build:main && npm run build:content && npm run postbuild
scripts.postbuild: mv dist/src/dashboard/index.html dist/dashboard/index.html 2>/dev/null && rmdir dist/src/dashboard 2>/dev/null && rmdir dist/src 2>/dev/null || true
